title: A random quote generator
description: This is the first project I did as a part of my Techdegree, it's a simple JavaScript application that displays a random quote that changes at a given interval or when you press the show new quote button.

title: Data pagination and filtering
description: This project was originally done as a project for my Techdegree. This application parses an array of objects and displays them in a nice format as well as adds pagination and dynamic search.

title: Interactive form
description: This project was originally done as a project for my Techdegree. This application is an interactive form that validates input dynamically and alters the form as choices are selected.

title: OOP Game Show App
description: This project was originally done as a project for my Techdegree. This application is a fun guessing game based on object oriented javascript that presents a random phrase for the player to guess.

title: Public API Requests
description: This project was originally done as a project for my Techdegree. This application fetches 12 random users from the random users API randomuser.me, parses the JSON and displays it nicely. There's also a dynamic search feature.

title: Static Node.js and Express site
description: This project was originally done as a project for my Techdegree. This is a static website running through Node.js, and the project was intended as a portfolio website, although I never used this publicly.

title: React Gallery App
description: This project was originally done as a project for my Techdegree. This was one of the first projects I made with React.js, and it features a photo gallery that fetches photos from the Flickr API.

title: SQL Library Manager
description: This project was originally done as a project for my Techdegree. This application uses express with jade/pug as the view engine and sequelize as the ORM to update a database for a library.

title: REST API in Node.js
description: This project was originally done as a project for my Techdegree. This application is a REST API that uses sequelize to connect to a database. There are no pictures for this project as it is an API, and all it returns is JSON, but another project listed on this page is a client for this API.

title: Fullstack School Database App
description: This project was originally done as a project for my Techdegree. This application features a React client that connects to a REST API that uses sequelize to connect to a database.
